strings.description.discord.command.bancommand: Bans the user from your current server
strings.discord.command.bancommand.success.embed: The user, ${user}, has been banned from **${guild}** for **${reason}**.
strings.discord.command.bancommand.error.unspeci: The user you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid user/ID.
strings.discord.command.bancommand.error.problem: An error occurred when using this command.
strings.discord.command.bancommand.error.ratelim: You're currently on cooldown! You have **${seconds}** left before you can use another command.
strings.discord.command.bancommand.error.already: This user has already been banned!
strings.discord.command.bancommand.error.botmiss: I am missing the `BAN_PERMISSION` permission. Please turn that on so I can ban said person.
strings.discord.command.bancommand.error.usermis: You are missing the `BAN_PERMISSION` permission. Please have the required permission so you can ban that person.
